ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d probably keep myself bound in a city. But then I play with clerics, so I haven t run back to my corpse in months. Corpse recovery is much more an issue
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 04/99, Bard <dabard@...> wrote:
> From: "Bard" <dabard@...>

> Also, here's a question for the folks that are against any change in
> binding: If there were a change (whether it's bards able to bind, everyone
> gets self-bind, anyone can be bound in any zone, etc), woudl you use it or
> keep through the multiple zones to get to your corpse?

I'd probably keep myself bound in a city. But then I play with clerics,
so I haven't run back to my corpse in months. Corpse recovery is much
more an issue than mere running for your corpse at higher levels.
Getting a second group together to help fight to your corpse when
fighting the ghoul lord or the efreeti are much harder and take way
longer than merely running to the zone.

With my druid I don't bind close to where I'm fighting either. Usually
there's a druid gate within 2 or 3 zones of where I am, and I'm used to
running that far as a bard anyway so it's no big deal. Currently my
druid is bound in quenos and fighting on Faydwer.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
